amendatorysection.catchline: Purchase of microfilm system or equipment; approval; property of State Records Administrator.
amendatorysection.para: After May 18, 1977, no state agency shall purchase any microfilm system or equipment prior to the approval of the State Records Administrator. The administrator shall not approve internal microfilm activities of any state agency unless such activities may not be feasibly provided by the central microfilming agency and are necessary to a particular operation within the state agency. Any equipment purchased under this section shall become the property of the State Records Administrator and shall be subject to the provisions of section 84-1223.
